name: TiMedusa
description:
Install instructions

Setup:

1. To play the game, download the SETUP.EXE file included with the submission.

2. Double click the SETUP.EXE to install TiMedusa and follow the on-screen instructions

until installation is complete.

3. Double click the TIMEDUSA.EXE or the desktop icon to launch the game!

Requirements to play:

1. Keyboard

2. Mouse

3. 32 or 64 bit Windows 7-10

4. 1 gigabyte of free hard drive space
